About $RICK

Step into the fantastical world of RICK Token, a blockchain adventure inspired by the beloved "Rick and Morty" animated series.

This unique crypto token merges the vibrancy of the show's multiverse with the power of decentralized finance. With RICK Token, every transaction becomes a journey through the crypto cosmos.

How to buy $rick?

.01
Create a Wallet
download metamask or your wallet of choice from the app store or google play store for free. Desktop users, download the google chrome extension by going to metamask.io.
.02
Go to Uniswap
connect to Uniswap. Go to app.uniswap.org in google chrome or on the browser inside your Metamask app. Connect your wallet. Paste the $rick token address into Uniswap, select rick, and confirm. When Metamask prompts you for a wallet signature, sign.
.03
Switch ETH for $rick
switch ETH for $rick. We have ZERO taxes so you donâ€™t need to worry about buying with a specific slippage, although you may need to use slippage during times of market volatility.
